short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for the arena to automatically message all your chats GM

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The following extension will provide added tools for the users of The Arena. The extension currently supports sending messages to all the chats that you are currently a part of. There are more features to come as the extension is built further
